amendment.description: To expand access to preventive health care services that reduce unintended pregnancy (including teen pregnancy), reduce the number of abortions, and improve access to women's health care.

action.text: Amendment SA 244 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Clinton.

vote.text: Amendment SA 244 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 75.
